scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm install --prefix user-service" "npm install --prefix payment-service" "npm install --prefix booking-service" "npm install --prefix cars-service" "npm install --prefix service-provider-service" "npm install --prefix services-service" "npm install --prefix notifications-service" "npm install --prefix review-service" "npm install --prefix auth-service" "npm install --prefix api-gateway" "npm install --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix user-service" "npm run dev --prefix payment-service" "npm run dev --prefix booking-service" "npm run dev --prefix cars-service" "npm run dev --prefix service-provider-service" "npm run dev --prefix services-service" "npm run dev --prefix notifications-service" "npm run dev --prefix review-service" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix auth-service" "npm run dev --prefix api-gateway"
